Ouch, I seem to be unable to get myself out of this state.  On startup I get a
window where a detached view should be, but there's nothing inside it.  If I
close it then my workbench is trashed.
OK, I got out of it by closing the perspective and re-opening it :)
I managed to reproduce this on windows XP today.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 88867 ***
